Text:
Thanks for the album but...
How the F**K do you burn this?!!!
Get a ''line 7'' error with nero, and Burrrrn just errors out altogether!!

@Arsventure
Recommend the program Imgburn.
Best of its kind - absolutely free

It's here:
http://www.imgburn.com/

Yeah, thanks, but just got filter errors after loading the cue with Imgburn. I'm telling you, there's a problem with the cue.
This is torture!!! :P

@FuZzYknUckLeS
Cue file is quite normal.
Five minutes ago ImgBurn burned CD.
The reason is not cue.

Open with notepad cue - verify it
